actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide a tax deduction on Federal income tax returns for time contributed in nonsalaried volunteer social or charitable work.
short_title: Tax Deduction for Volunteer Services Act

summary.text: Tax Deduction for Volunteer Services Act - Title I - Short Title and Definitions - Permits a tax deduction by an individual on Federal income tax returns for time contributed in non-salaried volunteer social or charitable work in direct assistance to the aged, infirm, economically disadvantaged, or minor children. Title II - Method of Administration and Determination - Provides that the monetary value may not exceed the prevailing specified Federal minimum wage multiplied by the number of hours of volunteer work certifiably performed.

titles.title: Tax Deduction for Volunteer Services Act
A bill to provide a tax deduction on Federal income tax returns for time contributed in nonsalaried volunteer social or charitable work.
